Posts.Content: Hi there,  chemo is different for different types of cancer dependingnonnwhere the cancer is and what type of cells are found. They can have many different side effects and number of treatments. You are probably best to join a group for carers or for people with the same type of cancer as your dad then you can ask all the questions you need.  Xx
Posts.Title: Confused daughter

Posts.Content: Hi Jeanette  you can get an NHS voucher for a wig to make it cheaper, the lady at the hospital supplied mine and cut it to suit me and everyone thinks it's amazing. Losing hair sounds really tough but it's temporary and manageable. Def go to a participating boots for the make over or the hospital you are at may have their own centre where they do the same in groups. All the best!  Sha. X
Posts.Title: Hair Care before and after Chemo

Posts.Content: I went  for my session today too, lots of fun and what an amazing goody bag!! Recommend it to anyone. X
Posts.Title: Look good, feel better
